Package com.rb.nonbiz.math

Class RBBigDecimals

java.lang.Object
com.rb.nonbiz.math.RBBigDecimals
public class RBBigDecimals
extends java.lang.Object
Various static utility methods related to Java's BigDecimal.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.math.BigDecimal RB_BIG_DECIMAL_MAX_VALUE  

  • Constructor Summary

    RBBigDecimals()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.math.BigDecimal bigDecimalAverage​(java.math.BigDecimal bd1, java.math.BigDecimal bd2)  
    static java.math.BigDecimal bigDecimalInvert​(java.math.BigDecimal bd)  
    static java.math.BigDecimal bigDecimalMax​(java.math.BigDecimal bd1, java.math.BigDecimal bd2)  
    static java.math.BigDecimal bigDecimalMin​(java.math.BigDecimal bd1, java.math.BigDecimal bd2)  
    static <T> T epsilonCompareBigDecimals​(java.math.BigDecimal left, java.math.BigDecimal right, Epsilon epsilon, RBDoubles.EpsilonComparisonVisitor<T> visitor)
    This method gives an abstraction over the Comparable::compareTo, which returns negative / 0 / positive, and also lets you do a comparison subject to an epsilon.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      public static <T> T epsilonCompareBigDecimals​(java.math.BigDecimal left, java.math.BigDecimal right, Epsilon epsilon, RBDoubles.EpsilonComparisonVisitor<T> visitor)
      This method gives an abstraction over the Comparable::compareTo, which returns negative / 0 / positive, and also lets you do a comparison subject to an epsilon.
